labels: Did you go to a medical practitioner, hospital or other health service to be tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?
What was the result of your test?
Have you been in face-to-face contact with anyone confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19?

questions.name: age
questions.label: What is your age?
questions.constraint_message: You must be 15 years or greater to use this survey.

questions.name: tested
questions.label: Did you go to a medical practitioner, hospital or other health service to be tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

choices.label: Yes, but I was not tested

questions.name: test_result
questions.label: What was the result of your test?

choices.label: Positive (I was found to have COVID-19)
I am unsure what my COVID-19 test result is
I am waiting for the result

questions.name: test_date
questions.label: What date were you tested?
questions.constraint_message: You cannot select a date in the future.

questions.name: contact
questions.label: Have you been in face-to-face contact with anyone confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19?

questions.name: contact_last_date
questions.label: What is the date of last contact?
questions.constraint_message: You cannot select a date in the future.

questions.name: contact_type
questions.label: Please select one of the following

choices.label: I was in close face-to-face contact for more than 15 minutes, including the 24 hours before they showed symptoms
I was in face-to-face contact for less than 15 minutes, including the 24 hours before they showed symptoms
I shared a closed space (e.g., same household, in a car or a work place) for more than 2 hours, including the 24 hours before they showed symptoms
I shared a closed space for less than 2 hours, including the 24 hours before they showed symptoms
I was in contact with someone confirmed to have COVID-19 but that was more than 24 hours before they showed symptoms
I work with people who are confirmed to have COVID-19

questions.name: travel
questions.label: Have you travelled internationally in the past 2 months?

questions.name: travel_country
questions.label: Which city and country did you travel to?

questions.name: travel_date
questions.label: What date did you return to the country you are in now?
questions.constraint_message: You cannot select a date in the future.

questions.name: face_contact_people
questions.label: Who are you in face-to-face contact with?

choices.label: A few friends, family and other people close to me
Only people in my household and some people outside my home including while getting food, going to work, or to look after other people
No one or almost no one

questions.name: face_contact_outings
questions.label: Do you go out of your home to do the following? (Select all that apply)
questions.constraint_message: Please select at least one option.

choices.label: Support others who cannot look after themselves

questions.name: face_contact_outings
questions.label: Do you go out of your home to do the following? (Select all that apply)
questions.constraint_message: Please select at least one option.

choices.label: Support others who cannot look after themselves

questions.name: face_contact_limit
questions.label: Why are you limiting face-to-face contact with other people? (Select all that apply)
questions.constraint_message: Please select at least one option.

choices.label: Local authorities (e.g., government agencies, public health) have placed restrictions on people meeting face-to-face (e.g., compulsory self-isolation or lockdown)
I have returned from travel and local authorities require me to limit my contact with others
I have been in contact with someone suspected to have COVID-19
I have been in contact with someone confirmed to have COVID-19
I am suspected or confirmed to have COVID-19
A household member is suspected or confirmed to have COVID-19

questions.name: face_contact_limit_date
questions.label: When did you start limiting face-to-face contact with others?
questions.constraint_message: You cannot select a date in the future.

questions.name: face_contact_limit_experience
questions.label: Optional: Thinking about the past 24 hours, please describe your experience of limiting face-to-face contact with other people.

questions.name: infection
questions.label: Do you have influenza or a lung infection that is not COVID-19?

questions.name: infection_type
questions.label: What type of lung infection do you have?

questions.name: __symptom_header
questions.label: Since this time yesterday, have you had the following symptoms:
hint: Whether or not you have symptoms, it is important to record if you do or donâ€™t have symptoms today. This helps to understand what is going on across communities and if there are changes over time.

questions.name: __activity_header
questions.label: Since this time yesterday, have you had difficulty to:

questions.name: activity_meals
questions.label: Prepare meals / get your own food

questions.name: activity_leaveroom
questions.label: Go out of the room you are in

questions.name: __feeling_header
questions.label: Since this time yesterday, have you felt:

questions.name: __worry_header
questions.label: Today, are you worried about how you can:

questions.name: worry_medecine
questions.label: Get the medicines that you or your family need

questions.name: worry_health_care
questions.label: Get health care when you need to

questions.name: worry_caring
questions.label: Care for people who you have a responsibility for

questions.name: worry_social
questions.label: Keep in contact with family and friends

questions.name: worry_children
questions.label: Care for children and their education
Where do you get the information you need to help you in the COVID-19 situation?

questions.name: userdetail_city
questions.label: What area, town or city are you in now?

questions.name: userdetail_first_nations
questions.label: Do you identify as an Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander person, or as a First Nations person?

questions.name: userdetail_language
questions.label: What language(s) do you speak at home?

questions.name: userdetail_healthcare
questions.label: Are you working in healthcare (e.g., doctor, nurse, allied health professional, aged care worker)

questions.name: userdetail_essential
questions.label: Do you work in an essential service? (e.g., hospital, supermarket, school, pharmacy, bank, petrol station)

questions.name: userdetail_household
questions.label: Including yourself, how many people (adults and children) live in your household/place of residence?

questions.name: userdetail_employment
questions.label: Optional: What is your employment status?

choices.label: I am uncertain about my employment

questions.name: userdetail_conditions
questions.label: Optional: Do you have any of the following conditions?
questions.constraint_message: Please select 'None', or at least one other option.

choices.label: Cancer (diagnosis or treatment within past 2 years)
Condition that lowers my immune system
